title: Berdorf Goodman Invites You to Celebrate Spring with Krizia
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: On a pink bachground bordered with blue, red, purple and yellow stripes, twenty-one photographic images of peanuts are arranged in three rows.  They are colored yellow and orange and are interspersed with drawings of small gray elephants and tiny red hearts. The name of the fashion designer, KRIZIA, is also scattered throughout the design.  Across the top of the sheet black text advertises the event at the Museum of Natural History.
name: Poster
